name: TriTis
description:
Move the pieces clasic style in this retro puzzle game! Destroy blocks, watch them fall and make awesome combos to be the best player in the entire world. 

Currently on beta. Work in progress.

KeyActionA - Left arrow
Move piece leftD - Right arrowMove piece rightW - Up ArrowThrow piece downS - Down ArrowMove piece downSpace bar Mirror piece

Music by:

  • LJ4
